definition: towards/to face/to turn towards/direction/to support/to side with/shortly before/formerly/always/all along/(suffix) suitable for .../oriented to ...
to tend toward/to guide/variant of 向[xiang4]
variant of 向[xiang4]/direction/orientation/to face/to turn toward/to/towards/shortly before/formerly
abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan

sentences.english: A re-creation of Van Gogh’s Sunflower painting made entirely from sushi.
sentences.chinese: 完全用寿司做的梵高向日葵的复制品。

sentences.english: Sunflowers are large flowers with yellow petals.
sentences.chinese: 向日葵是长着黄色花瓣的大花。

sentences.english: The seeds took root and grew, and the sunflowers multiplied.
sentences.chinese: 这些种子生根并生长，向日葵不断的繁殖。

sentences.english: Wherever the sunflowers grew there seemed to be a special golden glow in the air.
sentences.chinese: 只要有向日葵生长的地方就可以看到一片金色的天空。

sentences.english: Every time you look at a sunflower, the whole world starts to smile.
sentences.chinese: 每当你看着向日葵，整个世界也跟着笑逐言开起来。

sentences.english: Regardless, Van Gogh's paintings of sunflowers have altered mankind's perspective of art and life.
sentences.chinese: 梵高的向日葵通过艺术改变了人们对生活的看法。

sentences.english: Helianthus calls the 15th day of a lunar month lotus again, a very beautiful name.
sentences.chinese: 向日葵又叫望日莲，一个很美的名字。

sentences.english: His magnum opuses include The Starry Night, Sunflowers etc.
sentences.chinese: 他的代表作有《星夜》，《向日葵》等。

sentences.english: So we took the sunflower's price down from 100 to 50 (the cheaper price would encourage players to buy it over the peashooter).
sentences.chinese: 所以我们把向日葵的价格从100降到了50。

sentences.english: Sunflower seeds are rich in iron and low in saturated fat.
sentences.chinese: 向日葵种子富含铁和低饱和脂肪。
向日葵，天堂鸟，绿掌，玫瑰，桔梗。

sentences.english: Sunflowers don't bend themselves with any purpose in mind.
sentences.chinese: 向日葵在向日运动中是没有任何意识的。

sentences.english: The sunflower facing the direction of moving forward, till death do us part.
sentences.chinese: 向着向日葵面对的方向不断前行，至死方休。

sentences.english: "Sunflowers, " by Van Gogh, a painting from the same series as one of the stolen artworks, appears in this photo.
sentences.chinese: 上图中梵高的名作《向日葵》系被盗画作之一。

sentences.english: His smile like a forest at the end of the sunflower fields and lilies.
sentences.chinese: 他的笑容像是森林尽头的向日葵田与百合花。

sentences.english: The bird pecked seeds out of the sunflower.
sentences.chinese: 那只鸟用喙从向日葵中啄出种子。

definition: Vincent Van Gogh (1853-1890), Dutch post-Impressionist painter
Vincent Van Gogh (1853-1890), Dutch post-Impressionist painter
style of folk song popular in Gansu, Qinghai and Ningxia/CL:首[shou3]
